snippet.title: Prisoner of War (2002) [PS2] - RetroArch with PCSX2
snippet.description:
It is World War II, and the player takes the role of an American pilot, Captain Lewis Stone, who is thrown into a prison camp of the Nazis. While attempting to escape the camp, Captain Stone discovers that the Germans are developing a secret weapon they intend to use against the Allies. Soon his personal wish of escape turns into a desire to save the world from the destruction the Nazis are planning.

--
This is the official second but simplest page of @LibRetro for #RetroArch. Our goal is to share the game videos we got while using our cores. The performance of  the content is to differ from content to content and from core to core.

Don't forget to follow our pages below.

https://libretro.com/
https://retroarch.com/
https://www.youtube.com/Libretro
--
Version: 1.9.14
System: PC (GTX 1080, Ryzen 7 1800x, 32GB 2800Mhz)
Core: PCSX2
